timeline.bodyHTML:
if (currentBanner.getFormat() != null) {
        return currentBanner.getFormat();
    } else {
        final Integer formatW = currentBanner.getW();
        final Integer formatH = currentBanner.getH();
        return formatW != null && formatH != null
                ? Collections.singletonList(Format.builder().w(formatW).h(formatH).build())
                : Collections.emptyList();
    }
}

timeline.body:
Ok. 
1. Make variable for values that need to be checked. For example. What is 11. int firstImpBannerW = 10
firstImpBannerH = 11
etc

2. Usage of `extracting(HttpRequest::getPayload).hasSize(1)` just to extract this value next is not necessary.
Try to make clear pipeline.
smth like this
```        assertThat(result.getValue())
                .extracting(HttpRequest::getPayload)
                .extracting(invibesBidRequest -> mapper.readValue(invibesBidRequest.getBidParamsJson(), InvibesBidParams.class))
                .containsOnly(expectedInivibesBidParameters)
```
Like in the method below
